No kidding.  The meal I had here was one of the best I've had (I won't speak for my husband).  We showed up early (by Spanish standards) and they seated us, but said they had a reservation for our table in 2 hours.  Then they did not rush us at all.  Delicious wine and really delicious tapas.  Let's see... we had squid gratin, crunchy tomato toast, the special pork shoulder, one or two others, but the best was the salmon carpaccio.  It may have been the tastiest thing I've ever eaten in my life.  Our waiter was quite wonderful and charming.  Cozy restaurant.  I hope you'll enjoy it as much as we did!
